comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Could someone bring along a bunch of bungee cords? I may need a tow up Poorman. See ya' at noon:15, DU

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Hey, did Dennis really insinuate that he'll be joining the Frenzy rides once he's retired or was it my imagination? And Dennis better come out of retirement, bike racing retirement that is, since he's got that hella dope bike now.

comments.author: RL
comments.body: Hey guys: new site looks cool... and i'm sorry i missed the ride today! see you tomorrow? RL
